headline: Barclays Slashes PT on BlackRock (BLK) to $1,340 From $1,360, Maintains an Overweight Rating
summary: BlackRock, Inc. (NYSE:BLK) is one of the most profitable NYSE stocks to buy right now. On December 12, Barclays slashed its price target on BlackRock, Inc. (NYSE:BLK) to $1,340 from $1,360 and maintained an Overweight rating on the stock. The firm told investors that it revised targets in the brokers, asset managers, and exchanges group […]

headline: Taking Stock of BlackRock (BLK): Is the Asset Manager Quietly Undervalued After Modest Recent Gains?
summary: BlackRock (BLK) shares have moved modestly over the past month, leaving investors weighing solid long term returns against a recent dip in the past 3 months and only mid range value metrics. See our latest analysis for BlackRock. At around $1,082 per share, BlackRock has logged a mid single digit year to date share price return. Its 1 year total shareholder return in the low single digits suggests momentum has cooled a little after very strong 3 year gains. If BlackRock has you thinking about...
